extendedInfo.description: Current prices for precious metals, bullions and coins around the world.The 1x1 widget shows the current market prices for gold and silver.For enlargement of one chart please click on it.The available sources can be configured via the menu item "Sources".List of data sources:Current spot prices for gold and silver,London fixing prices for precious metals,Central Bank of the Republic of Azerbaijan,National Bank of the Republic of Belarus,Central Bank of Oman,Central Bank of Russia (reference prices and coins),National Bank of Ukraine (reference prices and coins),Perth Mint (Australia),Austrian Mint,Shanghai Gold Exchange (China),Comptoir National de l'Or (France),Bars and coins of Anlagegold24 (Germany),Heraeus Precious Metals (Germany),TG Gold-Super-Markt (Germany),Bars and coins of Bank of China (Hong Kong),Gold Rate City (India),National Spot Exchange (India),Coziie - Gold Coin Rates in India,Israel Coins and Medals Corp.,Tanaka Kikinzoku Kogyo (Japan),Tokyo Commodity Exchange (Japan),Dutch Bullion (Netherlands),New Zealand Post,Karachi Saraf & Jewellers Group (Pakistan),Polish Mint,Sberbank of Russia (prices by region),Istanbul Gold Exchange (Turkey),Cookson Precious Metals UK,Johnson Matthey (United Kingdom),Pacific Precious Metals (USA),Saigon Jewelry Company (Vietnam),coins and bars on eBay US, eBay UK, eBay Canada, eBay Australia and other regional auction platforms.
